item.title: Unsupervised 3D Human Pose Estimation
item.description:
• Wrote data-loaders and modeled the architecture for kinematic-structure preserving, unsupervised 3D pose estimation framework to effectively disentangle pose, foreground and background appearance information.

  • Reduced MPJPE by as high as 40% (semi-supervised) and 15% (unsupervised) on datasets like Human3.6M, 3DHP, LSP and 3DPW.

  • Advisors: Venkatesh Babu and Jogendra Nath Kundu

item.title: Unsupervised Deep Domain Adaption for Object Detection
item.description:
• Analyzed negative transfer (around 20% drop in mAP from baseline) and catastrophic forgetting of the existing imageto-image domain adaptation approaches on face-detection datasets.
  • Studied the use of local features, and temporal information from trackers to generalize unsupervised domain adaptation approaches on datasets like SCUT and Widerface.
  • Advisor: Eric Granger
